casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. William M. Anderson, Jr. State of Connecticut v. William M. Anderson, Sr. State of Connecticut v. Michael Anderson (13052)

O’Connell, Landau and Schallek, Js.

Argued January 9 decision released March 7, 1995 *903Timothy C. Moynahan, for the appellants (defendants). LeonF. Dalbec, Jr., assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John A. Connelly, state’s attorney, and Edward Ricciardi, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgments are affirmed.
